item.title: Meal Manifesto üìú
item.description: ‚ö†Ô∏è A note to readers: This document is written by Aiden for his own use as an individual, therefore general usability is not guaranteed, especially for those that are not Aiden. Document Sections Purpose Statement Term Definitions Document Organization Meals for Self Feeding the Crowds Fancy Food Lavish Treats Hobby Foodstuff Recipe Appendix Ingredient Appendix Purpose Statement The purpose of this document is to provide a document for Aiden, by Aiden, to improve his intentionality and efficiency in making food for himself and others while being in alignment with his food goals.
